body.name: Anti-Theft Video Doorbell Mount Compatible with Ring Video Doorbell 1/2/3/3Plus/4 Generation, 2020-2021 Release, Pro-Pro2, Nandaga No-Drill Doorbell Mount Compatible with Blink
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 16 hrs 35 mins
features: 【Anti-Theft Design for Doorbell】The video doorbell gets full protection with the upgraded design. The doorbell mount can't be removed from the outside unless the door is open. The mount keeps your video doorbell away from being stolen and safeguards your safety and property.

【Compatible What Video Doorbells】The video doorbell mount perfectly fit for Video Doorbells (1/2/3/3Plus/4 generation, 2020-2021 Release, Pro-Pro2). The video doorbell camera sensor will not be blocked.

【Compatible What Door】The doorbell mount is only suitable for inward-opening doors (outward opened door is not suitable), and the thickness of your door must be within 0.59 to 2.36 inches and the door gap width over 0.06 inches. Please measure your door thickness before order.

【How to Install】Put your video doorbell in the shell of the doorbell mount, fix it with sponge pads, and attach the doorbell mount with screws to the shell.Then adjust the fixed clip according to your door thickness. No drilling is required, the wall or door will remain intact. You can adjust the height of the doorbell bracket at any time.

【What Package Include】1 Video doorbell mount, instruction manual,screws, and a fixed clip. If you have any questions about products or installation, please feel free to contact us, we will reply you back with details.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What Video Doorbells Compatible with? The video doorbell mount perfectly fit for Video Doorbells (1/2/3/3Plus/4 generation, 2020-2021 Release, Pro-Pro2).

What Door Fit for? The doorbell mount is only suitable for inward-opening doors (outward opened door is not suitable), and the thickness of your door must be within 0.59 to 2.36 inches and the door gap width over 0.06 inches. Please measure your door thickness before order. Please kindly note： Some iron security doors or door with uneven frame are not suitable for this kind of doorbell bracket. Please check your door type before buying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my mothers apartment door and it is very easy to insall and set up. My mother did it herself ! The product is as advertised and very strong. I would buy from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product would’ve been perfect but my door would not close with it in position

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent if it Worked for my Weird Door
reviews.reviewText: My door is weird. The size and shape is unlike anything I've ever seen before. It has a pretty stained glass window in the center, so I'm hesitant to replace it. With that said, I was hoping that this doorbell would be mountable to it. It was not. The size and shape are too much even for this doorbell.If I had a normal door, this would have been perfect for it. It holds the Ring doorbell safe and securely with all of the included foam padding. The construction is pretty strong and unless someone is inside of the door, they wouldn't be able to remove the doorbell. Unless they brought a crowbar, but if someone has a crowbar at your door, you have other things to worry about. This even comes with a soft but thick rubber stopper for the back of the screw to prevent scratching your door where the tension knob is.Even though, it didn't fit with my bizarre door, it does do a good job, and after some "modification" that the manufacturer would probably frown upon, I did end up mounting it to my door, its just a little questionable. But at the end of the day, so long as it works, and this definitely does.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Giving this 5 stars because while it is a good item, i have been having trouble with my ring camera itself not sure if this item is blocking my camera connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and you can adjust accordingly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to put up. It worked great with my doorbell camera. I did put cardboard behind the back and on the door to prevent it from scratching the paint. But it does come with styrofoam to help with the padding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality item! I ordered this for my Blinc cameras so I wouldn’t have to drill my brick and could easily remove it when changing the batteries. The item was put together in a matter of minutes and definitely feels secure to my door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Mountable Bluetooth steady durable easy install

reviews.reviewTitle: Fits Ring Video well. Easy to use
Good Product and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The product came with a large amount of pads for protection. It worked as described and working well and easy to install.
